g:HTMLPanel.p: In this chapter we learned the ins and outs of GWT-RPC. The following examples were provided in this chapter.

GTwitter - This is a very basic frill-free Twitter client. To use it you enter in the name of the Twitterer that you want to see updates for, and it downloads and displays those updates. GTwitter uses the Twitter4J client library, an open-source tool that is freely available.
This is an alternate version of the GWT-RPC example that includes XSRF protection.
